trans-unit.source: Provides a notification mechanism for a tracking service to inform the runtime tracking infrastructure about changes to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for a particular workflow <xref:System.Type>.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Tracking services manage the tracking profiles available to the runtime tracking infrastructure.

A tracking service that implements IProfileNotification can provide notifications to the runtime tracking infrastructure when a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for a particular workflow <xref:System.Type> either changes or is no longer valid.

The runtime tracking infrastructure subscribes to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved> events and updates its cache when these events are raised.
This decreases the number of requests for tracking profiles that the runtime tracking infrastructure makes to a tracking service.

Note: the runtime tracking infrastructure still uses the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetProfile%2A> methods of the tracking service, but it does not call them as frequently.
Occurs when a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for a specific workflow Type is removed.

A tracking service can raise the ProfileRemoved event to inform the runtime tracking infrastructure that new instances of the workflow <xref:System.Type> specified in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs> should not be tracked.
Occurs when a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for a specific workflow <xref:System.Type> is updated.

A tracking service can raise the ProfileUpdated event to inform the runtime tracking infrastructure that a new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> is available for the indicated workflow <xref:System.Type>.
The workflow <xref:System.Type> and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> are passed in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>.
